name: abWheelie
description:
Help Wheelie collect all the screws and secret vehicle parts and avoid the nasty enemies trying to attack him.

Control Scheme A: Natural

Move right - β (B)

Move left - α (A)

Jump - α (A) whilst moving right, β (B) whilst moving left, α + β (A + B) whilst stationary

Jump slam - α + β (A + B) whilst jumping

Control Scheme B: Shift

Move right - α (A)

Move left - double-tap α (A)

Jump - β (B)

Jump slam - α + β (A + B) whilst jumping
